name: OXFORD TRUST
briefDescription: 1. Child Welfare.2. Education.3. Training Centre for drop out children.4. Welfare for physically challenged.5. And Welfare activities Scheduled Cassette and Scheduled Tribes.6. Social awareness camp7. Mobile Medical care UnitOur target groups are Differently abled people,Dalit, women, children, youth, unorganized workers, landless labourers, the aged and the disabled. From the inception of our organization we are involved in programmes. Such as to learn awareness, skill development, non-formal education, legal aid, consumer rights, child education, sports development, community development, leadership training, formation of sangam, environmental protection, Health,human rights, elimination of child labour, protection of street children, empowerment and income generation activities etc.,
